author: Source: Tring Today
title: Rise of cyber crime poses challenge for police - Tring Today
text:
Congratulations, you're now registered! Let us know what news and updates you want to hear about and we'll send them straight to your inbox. Last week TalkTalk's chief executive had to apologise to customers after a "significant and sustained cyber attack" on its website left millions of people potentially at risk of having had their credit card and bank details stolen.
 Tring Today.
